verses.roman:
ei-mata darśane trijagat nistāri
ye keha āsite nāre aneka saṁsārī

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; darśane—by direct visits; tri-jagat—the three worlds; nistāri—delivering; ye keha—some who; āsite nāre—could not come; aneka—many; saṁsārī—persons entangled in this material world.
translation: Thus by direct meetings, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu delivered the three worlds. Some people, however, could not go and were entangled in material activities.
